attributes.action: Recommend awarding the George Cross to the NHS once the pandemic is over.
attributes.additional_details: We have come out to clap the NHS on consecutive Thursdays but we feel some more permanent recognition should be given. The George Cross is the civilian equivalent of the Victoria Cross, and there have been two occasions when it has been awarded to groups - to the people of Malta in 1942 and to the RUC and their families in 1999, so there is a precedent, and the NHS workers have been every bit as brave in the face of adversity as those two groups.
attributes.background: The George Cross committee of the Cabinet Office should recommend that the Queen awards the NHS the George Cross for their collective heroism and bravery in battling the pandemic and saving lives - from doctors to nurses and support staff and everyone working for the NHS.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept petitions that call for specific awards or honours, such as the George Cross, to be given to individuals or organisations, because we can only accept petitions about matters for which the Government or Parliament are responsible.

There is an independent process for considering nominations for awards and honours, including the George Cross, and advising the Queen on granting these, so it is not something the Government or Parliament can do.

Information about Civilian gallantry is available here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/civilian-gallantry-operation#the-george-cross-committee

And details of how to nominate someone for an honour or award are available here: https://www.gov.uk/honours/recommend-bravery-award

You may wish to sign these petitions calling for a similar action:

Award Covid-19 medals to all emergency services and involved armed forces: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302613

A medal to honour the fortitude of people working in essential occupations: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308035

Award medals to the retired doctors and nurses who returned to NHS for COVID19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315329

Award posthumous medals to NHS and other frontline workers; victims of covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312389
